Problem: The trash function is in a suboptimal position
Ambiguous difference between the 'Goodnotes 6' function and the 'store' function. They could be merged into a single function
Ambiguity in the process of creating a document. The 'create notebook' function has an ambiguous name
The 'select' icon (next to 'settings') is not representative
The icon representing the magnifying glass function is not easily identified
The 'v' icon next to the document name is not significant. It is not representative of the function it performs
The 'Bookmark' icon in the upper right corner of each document is not representative of the function it performs
In the settings, there are two options 'Data Backup' and 'Automatic Backup' that could be grouped into a single option
It is unclear how to use the 'Lasso' tool, especially in copy and paste situations
When creating a new folder, if using a tablet pen, the keyboard does not appear automatically but must be opened by clicking a separate button
The toolbar has an excessive number of functions which can sometimes be confusing. Functions could be grouped better
The 'sticker' function button is not representative
It is unclear what the button with the keyboard icon does
The 'Keyboard' function allows typing text on the document. It is not possible to change the font and size of the text
The 'Zoom' function enlarges an area of the document allowing more precise writing. The icon representing this function is not representative
The 'keyboard' and 'text box' functions could be combined into a single button instead of two separate ones
It is not clear how to change the pen stroke
When using the 'Lasso' tool, it is possible to save the selected item in the sticker collection, but the option to perform this function ('Add item') is not indicative
It is possible to adjust the pen pressure but it does not make any changes to it
It is not possible to resize elements by 'pinching' with fingers; one must use the specific buttons
Page indices are not intuitive; it is not clear how to use them
